changelog:
Syberia OS updated !!!

Build date :- 07/1/2019

Changelog:
new:
- Add support for the .opus file format
- SyberiaSettings: Custom Rounded Corner and Padding preferences
- Launcher3: Add Google search double tap option
- Settings: Add new 20SEVEN font
- SmartNav: update smartbar home drawable
- Auto face unlock v2 (Pie)
- Add animations to QS tiles
- Add interpolators to QS tile animations   
- Extended audio panel 
- Audio panel location
- Three-fingers-swipe to screenshot

fixed:
- Fixed new files not updated on PC when connected   to MTP
- Black theme fixes
- Fix Signature Spoofing (MicroG)
- Fix no default ringtone for slot2
- Fix voume panel animation
- Fix an issue where unlocking the SIM PIN failed
- Fix Miracast sound
- Fixed issue with AppOps service
- Fixed traffic indicator not hiding on lost connection
- Fix property setting with failure
- Fix showing empty signal strength for TD-SCDMA
- Fix full nav gestures

Improvements:
- OP gestures tweaks
- Improvements for render engine
- Clean Sim Dialog layout
- Modify connecitvity rematch logic to support MSIM devices
- Add HDMI hotplug handling
- Support fonts from Substratum theme packages
- Update translations
- Updated white-list telephony modules

Device side :-
- Added Stock camera 
- 338 OTA sync
- Updated blobs from Jasmine,mi8 lite and nitrogen
- Updated Hals
- Fixed Audio Recording
- Improved Overall Audio quality
- Ability to disable sim card
- Cast fix (Not tested)
- Kernel Upstream
